channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Goldman Sachs expects layoffs to keep rising—and says investors are punishing the stocks of companies that slash staff
item.description: Analysts ran the numbers and found a surprising change in how investors are reacting to layoff announcements.

item.title: California farming mogul in bitter divorce proceedings arrested on suspicion of murdering his wife
item.description: Michael Abatti has grown onions, broccoli and cantaloupes and served on the board of the powerful Imperial Irrigation District from 2006 to 2010.

item.title: Drummer cancels Christmas Eve ‘Jazz Jams’ at Kennedy Center after name change, ending 20-year tradition
item.description: “When I saw the name change on the Kennedy Center website and then hours later on the building, I chose to cancel our concert,” Chuck Redd told the AP...

item.title: The global empathy crisis that confronts us this Christmas
item.description: Empathy levels diminished 14% across the U.S. after the pandemic, with the steepest drop among millennials, according to a United Way survey.

item.title: Christmas Sky: See A ‘Christmas Star,’ A Crescent Moon And Saturn
item.description: On Christmas night, Jupiter will be one of the brightest objects in the sky — and a stand-in for the mythical “Christmas Star.”

item.title: Telluride resort owner rips into ski patrol union after strikes shuts down slopes on Christmas
item.description: The Telluride Professional Ski Patrol Association voted to strike Saturday after contract negotiations since June failed to yield an agreement on pay.

item.title: First Crewed Moon Mission Since 1973 Is ‘Go’ For 2026 — What We Know
item.description: Artemis II will send astronauts around the moon in February-April 2026, marking NASA’s first crewed lunar mission in 53 years and paving the way for l...

item.title: Jack in the Box shut down more than 70 stores with more expected by year's end over financial struggles
item.description: Jack in the Box is closing dozens of restaurants as part of a major cost-cutting plan, with 72 locations shuttered so far and more expected in the nea...

item.title: Is The AI Job Apocalypse Real Or Overhyped?
item.description: Fears of an AI-driven job apocalypse are everywhere, but the reality inside most organizations is far more complex.

item.title: See The Moon And Saturn Dance This Christmas — Here’s When To Look
item.description: On Dec. 25 and 26, a waxing crescent moon will appear close to Saturn in the night sky after sunset, making a beautiful Christmas pairing.

item.title: ‘Pluribus’ Season 2 May Take Even Longer Than We Thought
item.description: It was always going to be a long wait for Pluribus season 2, but according to its creator, it's probably longer than we even think.

item.title: Holiday barks sold at Aldi recalled over potential undeclared pecans, wheat: FDA
item.description: Silvestri Sweets recalled Choceur-branded holiday bark sold at Aldi stores after a packaging mix-up led to undeclared allergens in the popular treats.

item.title: Mortgage rates fall ahead of Christmas holiday
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.18%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Wednesday. That is down fro...

item.title: Investors' real gift from Wall Street comes the day after Christmas
With 20 minutes left to trade, the S&P 500 looks to close at an all-time high
Move over Mariah: How Michael Bublé is becoming the king of Christmas music
S&P 500 closes at fresh record high in holiday-shortened session
S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
Where you can shop for your last-minute Christmas needs
item.description: Need last-minute holiday essentials? Find out which major retailers like Target have modified hours on Christmas Eve and will close for the holiday.

item.title: US economy grew much faster than expected in the third quarter, delayed report shows
item.description: U.S. economy surprises with 4.3% GDP growth in the third quarter of 2025, beating expectations of 3.3% as consumer spending and exports drive the stro...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
